value:
I am Naga. We are Naga. We exist as
others wish to see. To that end, I now
appear as the queen of ghosts.

Those who carry my blood are my
eyes, my shields, and my weapons.
Yet, this world seems to be unique...

Did you give some candy to the little
ones and receive some in turn? Then
let us be thankful for your harvest.

I am about to check on the little ones.
Would you like to join me? Here—a
mask, so that you may look the part.

You must not turn away little ones
seeking harvest treats. If you do, the
queen of ghosts will be very angry...

I trust you will treat the little ones
well. If not, Naga's flames—er, the
queen of ghosts' curse will find you...

All right, all together now, everyone:
"trick or treat!"

Some little ones are threatening to
play tricks just to get extra treats.
I cannot abide such naughty behavior.

As the queen of ghosts, I find myself
lacking in blessings. I feel nothing...

I am familiar with human customs.
Let me see... You intend to express
hospitality with this offering, yes?

Rowdy celebrants of the harvest
festival, hearken to me, for I am Naga.
No...tonight I am the queen of ghosts!

BOO! Heehee, did I scare you?
Festivals are a curious tradition, and
these outfits most curious of all.$k$pIt is not often that I must ask for what
I desire. Truly, it is a most peculiar
feeling.$k$pWith that said... Trick, or treat? Will
you choose to indulge me, or suffer
my wrath?$k$pKnow this: mere candy will not
suffice. As ruler of both dragons
and ghosts, I expect much more.$k$pIt must befit one of my position. Oh,
and need I remind you, trifling with
a dragon is akin to playing with fire...
I shall frighten you.
More treats?
Savor the harvest.
Let us celebrate.
I am... defeated...
Was it you who invited me to the harvest festival?
Ahh! So, that is considered a trick then?
I thank you for treating me and sharing these sweets.
I sense the presence of a dragon at this festival, one not unlike myself...
A costume? I've never donned such clothing before. Does it look strange?
May the people always feel gratitude for these earthly blessings.
You always find a way to share your own outlook.
Yes?
What must I do?
I bring bounty.
